reviews.review_msg: Course material is difficult but she tells you exactly what type of questions to expect on her exams, and tries her best to help you understand. Tends to give hints for assignments if you go to tutorial. Very nice prof and is very approachable.

First off do not let the low reviews from the 100 level courses fool you. Since this is a third year course she wants her students to do well. The assignments do require a lot of work but if you put the effort to work through them the exams will be easy. Tutorial attendance is a must as there will be lots of hints. Overall great and would do again!

Great prof and very very kind! She goes through material fast sometimes but she was always there for me when I needed help. She gives hints to those who show up to lectures too. What more can you ask for? Although her final exam was a lot harder than expected.

The course itself is hard, but her exams are not that hard cause she tells you the kind of questions U would C on quizzes and exams. So, U know what to focus on! Assignments are hard & very important, but if U go to her office, she will give U a lot's of hints. Btw, in this course 72%=B+  Highly recommended!  :D

This professor is by far the nicest professor I've had at SFU. After taking two courses with her, I officially have a role model to look up to. MBB 323 was very interesting, although most MBB majors fear the course. Loved the course, loved the teacher. Flawless!

I've had this prof for two courses now (PHYS 102 and MBB 323): she has a pretty similar teaching style in both. Exams are quite fair: if you attend lectures, you will be rewarded. She tends to emphasize the important bits. I'm not really a textbook person, but it's good if you don't get stuff in lecture. Overall, pretty straightforward course.

she's extremely disorganized.absolutely useless in class.doesn't know how to answer students questions in class. attending class in a waste of time. she was always 10 min late to class.she doesn't know anything about the biological aspect of this course she just knows physics and chemistry. midterm was fair. final was very long and very hard.
